opinion.posture: Proceedings under the Post Conviction Hearing Act. Robbery and related offenses. Before DeFURIA, J. No. 1572 Oct. T., 1979. Appeal from the order of the Court of Common Pleas of Delaware County, No. 5122 of 1975.
opinion.attorneys: Floyd Wilson, appellant, in propria persona; Frank T. Hazel, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
opinion.panel: Before HESTER, WICKERSHAM and LIPEZ, JJ.
